content: {"name": "Druid Hills Presbyterian Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "County or Counties Served: Fulton", "email": "", "url": "https://www.druidhillspresbyterian.org/food-pantry", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1026 Ponce De Leon Avenue Northeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Virginia-Highland", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30306", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.77444019999999, "longitude": -84.3538719}, "phones": [{"number": "(678) 656-2618", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Clients may visit twice a week"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Outdoor distribution"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
